title: Old Magazine font
content:
This is from a Chilean Magazine called Versiones Mundiales. It's from February 1946…

Any help would be appreciated…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110416230159im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letras_4395.jpg)
author: manuelk

comments.content:
It's Benedictine, an old hot metal Linotype face.

[http://typophile.com/node/48585](http://web.archive.org/web/20110416230159/http:/typophile.com/node/48585 "http://typophile.com/node/48585")

I don't think a digital version exists as yet, although a design student was working on it as a project and showing it here last fall.

[http://typophile.com/node/52159](http://web.archive.org/web/20110416230159/http:/typophile.com/node/52159 "http://typophile.com/node/52159")

See also: [http://typophile.com/search/?keys=benedictine](http://web.archive.org/web/20110416230159/http:/typophile.com/search/?keys=benedictine "http://typophile.com/search/?keys=benedictine")
